buttonAddToCartClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.KioskController
Adds a specific item to the user's cart.
buttonAdminAddAccountClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.AdminController
Adds a new account based on the data provided by the user.
buttonAdminAddProductClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.AdminController
Adds a new product to the inventory based on the data provided by the user.
buttonAdminEmployeeClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.AdminController
Switches the current view from the Admin page to the Employee page.
buttonAdminKioskClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.AdminController
Switches the current view from the Admin page to the Kiosk page.
buttonAdminLoadClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.AdminController
Loads either all product or account data based on the selected radio button.
buttonAdminLogoutClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.AdminController
Logs out the user; switches the current view to the login page.
buttonBackClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.LoginController
Reverts from the "Create New Account" page to the Login page.
buttonBuyClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.KioskController
Handles the event that user buys the products currently in their cart.
buttonClearCartClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.KioskController
Clears the user's cart of all products had been added to it.
buttonEmployeeAdminPageClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.EmployeeController
Switches the current view from the Employee to the Admin page.

Switched the current view from the Employee page to the Kiosk page.
buttonEmployeeLogoutClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.EmployeeController
Logs out the employee; switches the view to the Login page.
buttonKioskAdminPageClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.KioskController
Switches the current view from the Kiosk page to the Admin page.
buttonKioskEmployeePageClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.KioskController
Switches the current view from the Kiosk page to the Employee page.
buttonKioskHomeClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.KioskController
Takes the user back to the first page of products.
buttonKioskLogoutClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.KioskController
Logs out the user; switches the current view from the Kiosk page to the Login page.
buttonKioskSearchClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.KioskController
Performs a search for certain products in the inventory based on user input provided in the "search" text area.
buttonNextPageClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.KioskController
Takes the user to the next page of products.
buttonPreviousPageClicked() - Method in class application.controller.KioskController
Directs the user to the previous page of products.
buttonRestockClicked(Event) - Method in class application.controller.EmployeeController
Adds to the current stock of a specific product based on user input.
